DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Purpose study -To compare stent patency complication rate endoscopic ultrasound ( EUS ) guide stent insertion endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) guide stent insertion malignant biliary obstruction 2 . Subjects study -Patients biliary obstruction owe malignant tumor 3 . Methods study - Prospective randomize control study - Patients enrol randomly two group , EUS guide stent insertion group ERCP guide stent insertion group - Patients get assign procedure ( EUS guide stent insertion ERCP guide stent insertion ) decompression malignant biliary obstruction - After procedure , regular follow , blood test , image test do check sufficient biliary decompression , stent patency complication .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Comparing EUS v ERCP Stent Insertion Malignant Biliary Obstruction
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Inclusion criterion 1 ) age : 18 - 80 2 ) patient common bile duct dilatation malignant distal common bile duct obstruction radiologically 3 ) Hyperbilirubinemia ( total bilirubin > = 1.5 mg/dl ) 4 ) inoperable state 5 ) patient agree join study 2 . Exclusion criterion 1 ) patient endure sedation 2 ) patient bleed tendency ( PT > 1.5 INR , PLT < 50,000 ) 3 ) patient systemic infection 4 ) patient hilar obstruction
DOC.criteria: distal biliary obstruction due malignant tumor unresectable tumor Jaundice Children Hilar obstruction Active infection Bleeding tendency
